snippet: Andrew Upton and Cate Blanchett, the husband and wife team, have been co-artistic directors of the Sydney Theater Company since 2008. Mr. Upton's new term as artistic director will begin on Jan. 1.
abstract: Andrew Upton and Cate Blanchett, the husband and wife team, have been co-artistic directors of the Sydney Theater Company since 2008. Mr. Upton's new term as artistic director will begin on Jan. 1.

headline.main: Andrew Upton to Become Sole Artistic Director of Sydney Theater Company
headline.print_headline: For Sydney Theater, One Artistic Director
